0.text: Innate: Rell's basic attacks are empowered to deal 8 − 16 (based on level) bonus magic damage before reducing the target's  armor and  magic resistance by 10% for 4 seconds, refreshing on subsequent hits. Basic attacks against enemy  champions will refresh the duration for all nearby afflicted enemies.
0.html: Innate: Rell's basic attacks are empowered to deal 8 − 16 (based on level) bonus magic damage before reducing the target's  armor and  magic resistance by 10% for 4 seconds, refreshing on subsequent hits. Basic attacks against enemy champions will refresh the duration for all nearby afflicted enemies.
markedPassages: 8 − 16 (based on level)
armor
magic resistance
champions

1.text: Rell gains bonus armor and bonus magic resistance equal to the sum resistances reduced from all afflicted enemies, and Break the Mold's bonus damage is increased equal to the sum resistances reduced from the target.
1.html: Rell gains bonus armor and bonus magic resistance equal to the sum resistances reduced from all afflicted enemies, and Break the Mold's bonus damage is increased equal to the sum resistances reduced from the target.

2.text: Break the Mold will reduce the target's armor and magic resistance by a minimum of 5 − 12 (based on level), or 0.5 / 1.25 / 2 (based on level) versus  minions.
2.html: Break the Mold will reduce the target's armor and magic resistance by a minimum of 5 − 12 (based on level), or 0.5 / 1.25 / 2 (based on level) versus minions.
markedPassages: minions

3.text: Rell's attack windup is reduced「 by 0% − 7.14% (based on level). 」「 to 42% − 39% (based on level). 」
3.html: Rell's attack windup is reduced「 by 0% − 7.14% (based on level). 」「 to 42% − 39% (based on level). 」
markedPassages: 「 by 0% − 7.14% (based on level). 」「 to 42% − 39% (based on level). 」
「 to 42% − 39% (based on level). 」

0.text: Active: Rell thrusts her lance in the target direction that completely destroys damage-mitigating  shields of enemies hit before dealing magic damage, reduced to 50% against enemies beyond the first. The first enemy hit is also afflicted with  Break the Mold.
0.html: Active: Rell thrusts her lance in the target direction that completely destroys damage-mitigating shields of enemies hit before dealing magic damage, reduced to 50% against enemies beyond the first. The first enemy hit is also afflicted with Break the Mold.
markedPassages: shields
Break the Mold

1.text: If Rell is tethered with  Attract and Repel, she and the bound ally  heal for each enemy  champion hit.
1.html: If Rell is tethered with Attract and Repel, she and the bound ally heal for each enemy champion hit.
markedPassages: Attract and Repel
heal
champion

0.text: Passive: While Rell is Mounted, she gains  5% − 15% (based on level) bonus movement speed, which is only 20% − 40% (based on level) as effective for 3 seconds when she takes damage from non- minions and is removed for 4 seconds when she becomes  immobilized or  polymorphed.
0.html: Passive: While Rell is Mounted, she gains  5% − 15% (based on level) bonus movement speed, which is only 20% − 40% (based on level) as effective for 3 seconds when she takes damage from non- minions and is removed for 4 seconds when she becomes immobilized or polymorphed.
markedPassages: 5% − 15% (based on level) bonus movement speed
5% − 15% (based on level) bonus movement speed
minions
immobilized
polymorphed

1.text: Active: Rell becomes Dismounted and  leaps to the target location over the cast time, granting herself a  shield that lasts until destroyed or casting  Ferromancy: Mount Up. Upon arrival, she deals magic damage to nearby enemies and  knocks them up for 1 second. She will continue  sliding forward another 300 units over 0.5 seconds, though not through terrain, affecting further enemies along her path.
1.html: Active: Rell becomes Dismounted and leaps to the target location over the cast time, granting herself a shield that lasts until destroyed or casting Ferromancy: Mount Up. Upon arrival, she deals magic damage to nearby enemies and knocks them up for 1 second. She will continue sliding forward another 300 units over 0.5 seconds, though not through terrain, affecting further enemies along her path.
markedPassages: leaps
shield
Ferromancy: Mount Up
knocks them up
sliding

2.text: While Rell is Dismounted, she can cast  Ferromancy: Mount Up. Upon completing a  Recall channel or respawning, Rell will automatically revert to Mounted form without casting the ability and reset  Ferromancy: Mount Up's  cooldown.
2.html: While Rell is Dismounted, she can cast Ferromancy: Mount Up. Upon completing a Recall channel or respawning, Rell will automatically revert to Mounted form without casting the ability and reset Ferromancy: Mount Up's  cooldown.
markedPassages: Ferromancy: Mount Up
Recall
Ferromancy: Mount Up's
cooldown

3.text: This ability can be cast only while Rell is Mounted. Rell can cast  Attract and Repel and  Magnet Storm during the dash, and is not considered to be dismounted until after the leap ends. Ferromancy: Crash Down will cast at max range if cast beyond that.
3.html: This ability can be cast only while Rell is Mounted. Rell can cast Attract and Repel and Magnet Storm during the dash, and is not considered to be dismounted until after the leap ends. Ferromancy: Crash Down will cast at max range if cast beyond that.
markedPassages: Attract and Repel
Magnet Storm
possibleConcerningAbilities: This ability can be cast only while Rell is MOUNTED. Rell can cast  Attract and Repel and  Magnet Storm during the dash, and is not considered to be dismounted until after the leap ends. Ferromancy: Crash Down will cast at max range if cast beyond that.

0.text: Passive: While Rell is Dismounted, she gains  10% bonus armor and  10% bonus magic resistance, but her base movement speed is modified to 280. She has a movement speed cap of 290 − 400 (based on level).
0.html: Passive: While Rell is Dismounted, she gains  10% bonus armor and  10% bonus magic resistance, but her base movement speed is modified to 280. She has a movement speed cap of 290 − 400 (based on level).
markedPassages: 10% bonus armor
10% bonus magic resistance

1.text: Active: Rell becomes Mounted and gains  15% bonus movement speed for 3.5 seconds, increased while moving towards enemy  champions.
1.html: Active: Rell becomes Mounted and gains  15% bonus movement speed for 3.5 seconds, increased while moving towards enemy champions.
markedPassages: 15% bonus movement speed
champions

2.text: During this time, Rell empowers her next basic attack to consume the bonus movement speed to have a 0.2-second cast time, gain  100 bonus attack range and cause her to  charge at the target's location. Upon arrival or collision, she deals bonus magic damage,  stuns the target for 1 second, and  flings them 150 units over herself, though not through terrain.
2.html: During this time, Rell empowers her next basic attack to consume the bonus movement speed to have a 0.2-second cast time, gain  100 bonus attack range and cause her to charge at the target's location. Upon arrival or collision, she deals bonus magic damage, stuns the target for 1 second, and flings them 150 units over herself, though not through terrain.
markedPassages: 100 bonus attack range
charge
stuns
flings

3.text: While Rell is Mounted, she can cast  Ferromancy: Crash Down.
3.html: While Rell is Mounted, she can cast Ferromancy: Crash Down.
markedPassages: Ferromancy: Crash Down

4.text: Ferromancy: Mount Up  resets Rell's basic attack timer. This ability can be cast only while Rell is Dismounted.
4.html: Ferromancy: Mount Up resets Rell's basic attack timer. This ability can be cast only while Rell is Dismounted.
markedPassages: resets
possibleConcerningAbilities: Ferromancy: Mount Up  resets Rell's basic attack timer. This ability can be cast only while Rell is DISMOUNTED.

0.text: Passive: Rell forms a  tether between her and the ally bound by Attract and Repel, and grants the ally 10% of her total armor and 10% of her total magic resistance while they are nearby.
0.html: Passive: Rell forms a tether between her and the ally bound by Attract and Repel, and grants the ally 10% of her total armor and 10% of her total magic resistance while they are nearby.
markedPassages: tether

1.text: Active: Rell binds herself and the target allied champion nearest to the cursor with Attract and Repel. Rell can then recast Attract and Repel while the tether persists.
1.html: Active: Rell binds herself and the target allied champion nearest to the cursor with Attract and Repel. Rell can then recast Attract and Repel while the tether persists.

2.text: Recast: Rell erupts the tether, dealing magic damage and  stunning enemies between and around both herself and the bound ally for 0.5 seconds.
2.html: Recast: Rell erupts the tether, dealing magic damage and stunning enemies between and around both herself and the bound ally for 0.5 seconds.
markedPassages: stunning

3.text: Rell can self-target to dispel the current bind if she and her bound ally are not near enemy champions, and if she has not casted an ability nor taken damage from or attacked enemy champions within the last 3 seconds. Only one ally can be bound at a time, and selecting a new ally overrides the previous bind.Attract and Repel will incur a  2.75-second cooldown with no cost if Rell binds to an ally and a  1-second cooldown with no cost if she self-targets.
3.html:
Rell can self-target to dispel the current bind if she and her bound ally are not near enemy champions, and if she has not casted an ability nor taken damage from or attacked enemy champions within the last 3 seconds. Only one ally can be bound at a time, and selecting a new ally overrides the previous bind.
Attract and Repel will incur a  2.75-second cooldown with no cost if Rell binds to an ally and a  1-second cooldown with no cost if she self-targets.
markedPassages: 2.75-second
1-second

0.text: Active: Rell erupts with magnetic fury,  pulling nearby enemies inward. She then creates a gravitational field around her for the next 2 seconds that deals magic damage every 0.25 seconds to nearby enemies and  drags them towards her over the duration.
0.html: Active: Rell erupts with magnetic fury, pulling nearby enemies inward. She then creates a gravitational field around her for the next 2 seconds that deals magic damage every 0.25 seconds to nearby enemies and drags them towards her over the duration.

drags

textContent.html: During this time, Rell empowers her next basic attack to consume the bonus movement speed to have a 0.2-second cast time, gain  100 bonus attack range and cause her to charge at the target's location. Upon arrival or collision, she deals bonus magic damage, stuns the target for 1 second, and flings them 150 units over herself, though not through terrain.

skillTabs.concerningText: During this time, Rell empowers her next basic attack to consume the bonus movement speed to have a 0.2-second cast time, gain  100 bonus attack range and cause her to  charge at the target's location. Upon arrival or collision, she deals bonus magic damage,  stuns the target for 1 second, and  flings them 150 units over herself, though not through terrain.

textContent.text: While Rell is Mounted, she can cast  Ferromancy: Crash Down.
textContent.html: While Rell is Mounted, she can cast Ferromancy: Crash Down.

textContent.text: Ferromancy: Mount Up  resets Rell's basic attack timer. This ability can be cast only while Rell is Dismounted.
textContent.html: Ferromancy: Mount Up resets Rell's basic attack timer. This ability can be cast only while Rell is Dismounted.
possibleConcerningAbilities: Ferromancy: Mount Up  resets Rell's basic attack timer. This ability can be cast only while Rell is DISMOUNTED.

concerningSkills.skillName: ferromancy: mount up resets rell's basic attack timer. this ability can be cast only while rell is dismounted.

textContent.text: Passive: Rell forms a  tether between her and the ally bound by Attract and Repel, and grants the ally 10% of her total armor and 10% of her total magic resistance while they are nearby.
textContent.html: Passive: Rell forms a tether between her and the ally bound by Attract and Repel, and grants the ally 10% of her total armor and 10% of her total magic resistance while they are nearby.

textContent.text: Active: Rell binds herself and the target allied champion nearest to the cursor with Attract and Repel. Rell can then recast Attract and Repel while the tether persists.
textContent.html: Active: Rell binds herself and the target allied champion nearest to the cursor with Attract and Repel. Rell can then recast Attract and Repel while the tether persists.

textContent.text: Recast: Rell erupts the tether, dealing magic damage and  stunning enemies between and around both herself and the bound ally for 0.5 seconds.
textContent.html: Recast: Rell erupts the tether, dealing magic damage and stunning enemies between and around both herself and the bound ally for 0.5 seconds.

skillTabs.concerningText: Recast: Rell erupts the tether, dealing magic damage and  stunning enemies between and around both herself and the bound ally for 0.5 seconds.

textContent.text: Rell can self-target to dispel the current bind if she and her bound ally are not near enemy champions, and if she has not casted an ability nor taken damage from or attacked enemy champions within the last 3 seconds. Only one ally can be bound at a time, and selecting a new ally overrides the previous bind.Attract and Repel will incur a  2.75-second cooldown with no cost if Rell binds to an ally and a  1-second cooldown with no cost if she self-targets.
textContent.html:
Rell can self-target to dispel the current bind if she and her bound ally are not near enemy champions, and if she has not casted an ability nor taken damage from or attacked enemy champions within the last 3 seconds. Only one ally can be bound at a time, and selecting a new ally overrides the previous bind.
Attract and Repel will incur a  2.75-second cooldown with no cost if Rell binds to an ally and a  1-second cooldown with no cost if she self-targets.

textContent.text: Active: Rell erupts with magnetic fury,  pulling nearby enemies inward. She then creates a gravitational field around her for the next 2 seconds that deals magic damage every 0.25 seconds to nearby enemies and  drags them towards her over the duration.
textContent.html: Active: Rell erupts with magnetic fury, pulling nearby enemies inward. She then creates a gravitational field around her for the next 2 seconds that deals magic damage every 0.25 seconds to nearby enemies and drags them towards her over the duration.

skillTabs.concerningText: Active: Rell erupts with magnetic fury,  pulling nearby enemies inward. She then creates a gravitational field around her for the next 2 seconds that deals magic damage every 0.25 seconds to nearby enemies and  drags them towards her over the duration.

Active: Rell erupts with magnetic fury,  pulling nearby enemies inward. She then creates a gravitational field around her for the next 2 seconds that deals magic damage every 0.25 seconds to nearby enemies and  drags them towards her over the duration.

markedPassages: pulling
drags

1.concerningText: Active: Rell thrusts her lance in the target direction that completely destroys damage-mitigating  shields of enemies hit before dealing magic damage, reduced to 50% against enemies beyond the first. The first enemy hit is also afflicted with  Break the Mold.

Active: Rell thrusts her lance in the target direction that completely destroys damage-mitigating  shields of enemies hit before dealing magic damage, reduced to 50% against enemies beyond the first. The first enemy hit is also afflicted with  Break the Mold.
If Rell is tethered with  Attract and Repel, she and the bound ally  heal for each enemy  champion hit.

2.concerningText: Active: Rell becomes Dismounted and  leaps to the target location over the cast time, granting herself a  shield that lasts until destroyed or casting  Ferromancy: Mount Up. Upon arrival, she deals magic damage to nearby enemies and  knocks them up for 1 second. She will continue  sliding forward another 300 units over 0.5 seconds, though not through terrain, affecting further enemies along her path.

Active: Rell becomes Dismounted and  leaps to the target location over the cast time, granting herself a  shield that lasts until destroyed or casting  Ferromancy: Mount Up. Upon arrival, she deals magic damage to nearby enemies and  knocks them up for 1 second. She will continue  sliding forward another 300 units over 0.5 seconds, though not through terrain, affecting further enemies along her path.

3.concerningText: Active: Rell becomes Mounted and gains  15% bonus movement speed for 3.5 seconds, increased while moving towards enemy  champions.

During this time, Rell empowers her next basic attack to consume the bonus movement speed to have a 0.2-second cast time, gain  100 bonus attack range and cause her to  charge at the target's location. Upon arrival or collision, she deals bonus magic damage,  stuns the target for 1 second, and  flings them 150 units over herself, though not through terrain.

4.concerningText: Recast: Rell erupts the tether, dealing magic damage and  stunning enemies between and around both herself and the bound ally for 0.5 seconds.

5.concerningText: Active: Rell erupts with magnetic fury,  pulling nearby enemies inward. She then creates a gravitational field around her for the next 2 seconds that deals magic damage every 0.25 seconds to nearby enemies and  drags them towards her over the duration.

Active: Rell erupts with magnetic fury,  pulling nearby enemies inward. She then creates a gravitational field around her for the next 2 seconds that deals magic damage every 0.25 seconds to nearby enemies and  drags them towards her over the duration.

consume.originHTML:
Active

Unique – Trinket: Consume a charge to place an invisible Totem Ward at the target location, which grants sight of the surrounding area for 90 − 120 (based on average champion level) seconds (210 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds recharge time; 2 charges; 600 range).
consume.originText: UNIQUE – TRINKET: Consume a charge to place an invisible  Totem Ward at the target location, which grants  sight of the surrounding area for 90 − 120 (based on average champion level) seconds (210 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds recharge time; 2 charges; 600 range).

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+5 ability power
+30 health
+25% base health regeneration
+ 2 per 10 seconds

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Spoils of War: Grants a charge every 35 seconds, up to 3 charges. Basic attacks can consume a charge to execute minions below ( 50% / 30%) of their maximum health. Killing a minion by any means with a charge grants you and the nearest allied champion kill gold. These effects require an allied champion to be nearby. Receive diminishing gold from excessive minion kills.
Unique – Quest: Earn 500 using this item to upgrade to Targon's Buckler, gaining the Warding active with 3 wards in stock.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – SPOILS OF WAR: Grants a charge every 35 seconds, up to 3 charges. Basic attacks can consume a charge to  execute minions below ( 50% /  30%) of their maximum health. Killing a minion by any means with a charge grants you and the nearest allied champion kill  gold. These effects require an allied champion to be nearby. Receive diminishing gold from excessive minion kills.

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Coruscation: Becoming affected by or applying an immobilizing or grounding effect to or from an enemy champion affects them and all enemy champions within 600 units of you with Repent, increasing the damage they take by 10% for 5 seconds.
Mythic Passive: Empowers each of your other Legendary items with 5 armor and 5 magic resistance.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – CORUSCATION: Becoming affected by or applying an  immobilizing or  grounding effect to or from an enemy champion affects them and all enemy champions within  600 units of you with Repent, increasing the damage they take by 10% for 5 seconds.

1.originHTML: +  +  500

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+20 ability haste
+250 health
+250 mana
+35 armor

active.originHTML:
Active

Unique – Conduit: Designate the target allied champion as the Accomplice, forming a tether between you and them. Champions can only be designated as the Accomplice by one Zeke's Convergence at a time (60 second cooldown; 1250 range).
active.originText: UNIQUE – CONDUIT: Designate the target allied champion as the Accomplice, forming a  tether between you and them. Champions can only be designated as the Accomplice by one Zeke's Convergence at a time (60 second cooldown;  1250 range).

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Convergence: Immobilizing enemy champions marks them for 8 seconds. Your Accomplice's basic attacks on-hit and ability hits against marked enemies fire a missile at them that deals 30 − 70 (based on level) (+ 7.5% AP) (+ 1.5% maximum health) bonus magic damage upon arrival.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – CONVERGENCE:  Immobilizing enemy champions marks them for 8 seconds. Your Accomplice's basic attacks on-hit and ability hits against marked enemies fire a missile at them that deals 30 − 70 (based on level) (+ 7.5% AP) (+ 1.5% maximum health) bonus magic damage upon arrival.

1.originHTML: +  +  700

active.originHTML:
Active

Unique – Pledge: Designate the target allied champion as being Worthy, forming a tether between you and them. Champions can only be designated as Worthy by one Knight's Vow at a time (60 second cooldown; 1250 range).
active.originText: UNIQUE – PLEDGE: Designate the target allied champion as being Worthy, forming a  tether between you and them. Champions can only be designated as Worthy by one Knight's Vow at a time (60 second cooldown;  1250 range).

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Sacrifice: While your Worthy ally is tethered to you and you are above 30% of your maximum health, redirect 10% of the post-mitigation physical and magic damage they take to you as true damage and heal for 7% of the damage dealt by your Worthy ally to champions. If they are below 30% maximum health, the damage redirection is increased to 20%.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – SACRIFICE: While your Worthy ally is tethered to you and you are above 30% of your maximum health, redirect 10% of the post-mitigation physical and magic damage they take to you as true damage and  heal for 7% of the damage dealt by your Worthy ally to champions. If they are below 30% maximum health, the damage redirection is increased to 20%.
